sqlMap.select: select * from DOCUMENTTYPE where parentId = 0 order by name
select * from DOCUMENTTYPE where parentId = #parentId# order by name
select * from DOCUMENTTYPE where name = #name# and parentId = #parentId#

select DOCUMENTTYPE.id, DOCUMENTTYPE.name, DOCUMENTTYPE.parentId, DOCUMENTTYPE.deleted FROM ( select DOCUMENTTYPE.*, DOCUMENTTYPE.NAME AS FIRST, '' as SECOND from DOCUMENTTYPE WHERE deleted = 0 and parentId = 0 UNION select DOCUMENTSUBTYPE.*, DOCUMENTTYPE.NAME AS FIRST, DOCUMENTSUBTYPE.NAME AS SECOND from (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENTTYPE WHERE parentId != 0 and deleted = 0) DOCUMENTSUBTYPE, (SELECT * FROM DOCUMENTTYPE WHERE parentId = 0 and deleted = 0) DOCUMENTTYPE WHERE DOCUMENTSUBTYPE.parentId = DOCUMENTTYPE.id order by FIRST, SECOND) DOCUMENTTYPE;
sqlMap.update: update DOCUMENTTYPE set name = #name#, orderNumber = #orderNumber#, deleted = #deleted# where ID = #id#
update DOCUMENTTYPE set deleted = 1 where id = #id#
